data.message:
Is there a reason Facebook has memorialized my account when I am not even dead? lol Literally have this on my page now: "Remembering Chase Orsini-Liberatore
We hope people who love Chase will find comfort in the things others share to remember and celebrate his life." I AM NOT EVEN DEAD

replies.message: Hi Chase. For a brief period today, a message meant for memorialized profiles was mistakenly posted to other accounts. This was a terrible error that we have now fixed and worked quickly to resolve. Thanks for taking the time to report the issues and hope that no one was too affected by the problem! -Jessica

Hi facebook I have a question but please answer me...
Messenger and Facebook are group?
Please reply me and answer my question clearly...😃

Hi, Barby. Messenger is a better messaging experience—with added speed and new features¬ like the groups tab, the ability to make voice calls and easy new ways to take and send photos and videos within the app. Plus, it links seamlessly with the Facebook app to make switching between the two quick and easy! Learn more: http://bit.ly/2irHUFi. -Rhea
Thank you very much Facebook for answer my question...😄😄
You're very welcome, Barby, Have a great day! -Rhea
